Based on your preferences, it seems you enjoy a bright and cheerful atmosphere, especially when it's sunny outside, as indicated by your repeated instructions to turn the bedroom lights to yellow. This suggests you prefer warm, inviting lighting that can enhance a positive mood.

If you're looking to create an impressive atmosphere, you might consider using warm white or soft yellow lighting, perhaps combined with some dimmable options to adjust the brightness based on the time of day or occasion. If you have any specific occasions or themes in mind, feel free to share, and I can provide more tailored suggestions!
